User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the PetLife application.

isPro.description: Indicates if the user has a Pro subscription.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Uses path-based ownership for private user data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is simplified to only store user profiles. Pet-related collections have been removed to simplify the application and resolve issues with the onboarding flow. This focuses the data model on the core user entity.
